website_summaries.verdict: A professional-grade styling tool with features and capabilities that give you salon-quality results without leaving home.
pros: Combines a 24K-gold-plated barrel and charcoal-infused bristles to produce professional-looking blowouts
Ion tech smooths frizz for soft, sleek locks
Has a contoured handle and 3 heat settings
cons: While you'll love the powerful heat for locking in your style, you'll also need to be careful not to burn your fingers

customer_reviews.title: Item stopped working within just 3mins of turning on on cool setting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and was excited to try .. switched it on cool setting and while using, just within 3 mins there was a spark, burning smell and completely stopped working .. feeling disappointed.. have requested for a refund upon return.. Hopefully I can make another purchase after the refund and not get disappointed again becoz the part of hair I tested on was super smooth and it did pull out some strands my hair but didnt leave it frizzy. It's a good product but I guess I got the faulty one. :((
customer_reviews.author: Ss10

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Better than the revlon one step styler. AwEsOmE! Better quality and seems to create a smoother blowout. Plus it dries my hair super fast. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Indira

customer_reviews.title: It works, but it will also damage your hearing.
customer_reviews.text: So I will say first off that this product does work. It has my curly right to the root hair straight in about 5 minutes. But... It is honestly the worst most awful sound I've ever heard its impossibly loud and for the first half a dozen or so uses it was just the sound of a hair dryer. Now, after what is probably a sum total of about 15 uses, it sounds like a commercial fire alarm is going off IN my ears. I dont know if its defective, but it is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan D.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product received
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive the item. However, in the first use some bristles came off, then I was surprised to find that the cool option started to blow super hot air.. which left me confused. Thereafter I started hearing weird popcorn popping noises inside. The moment I heard it I got scared and I switched it off...there were fumes from inside and I realized the product was faulty. I am returning the product now... so disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Almost  perfect but... disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product was almost perfect if is wasn't because after I finished drying my hair the very first time I noticed that the big bristles were falling out. I requested a replacement and the same thing happened. I am on my 3 rd replacement which I haven't use yet, so let's see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Puca1207

customer_reviews.title: Salon approved!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a hair stylist and I personally love this product. I have one for myself and bought one for my mom as well for her birthday. She is obsessed with it! I think this product is great for clients who have a hard time juggling a brush and a blow dryer to get that “blown out” salon look. Don’t think twice about it. This is an item that you won’t regret buying!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Oh my god, if you have hair, you NEED this thing
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap this thing is awesome. I have super thick hair which goes to kamiya above my butt. Drying my hair takes freaking days. Until this magical thing! It dries my hair super fast and the bristles smooth my hair perfectly! I don’t even USE my hair dryer anymore, this does exactly what I need!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hebert

customer_reviews.title: This will fry your hair if you’re not careful!
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this as much as other people do, but I just don’t. It gets hot... and I mean really hot. I foresee people with frazzled hair realizing it was this that caused it. The manufacturer really needs to tone down the heat or at least give the user an option to use a lower temp. The “low” setting is for air flow only... it’s still hot! You should only use this as a quick fix and not for very long!
customer_reviews.author: JElle

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife Happy Life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a gift. I read reviews and there are other ones that are similar for cheaper... but i got the better on because she deserves the best. She told me that this is so much faster for her to use when getting ready in the morning. she said that it takes her 5-10 minutes on her hair now, when she used to spend about 30-40 minutes before. that seems worth it to me and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Frank

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this tool!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I'm saying this: But I bought this product after watching a YouTube beauty vlogger compare it to two other brands. They recommended the Hot Tools version and I AM BLOWN AWAY with how amazing it is! Way better than my cheaper Conair spin brush dryer alternative. Dried my hair much faster and left a perfect style! The product is super easy to use, much easier than the spin brush dryer I'd been using. Will be great for traveling as I won't have to bring a blow dryer and curling/flat iron. Saves time for sure with way better results than I've got with any other tool. Highly recommend adding this tool to your hair routine!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the damage it will cause
customer_reviews.text: This product did what it says. It dries and straightens in a short amount of time. I loved the results... Until I saw HOW much damage had been done just after a handful of times using it. I was really disappointed because I liked it a LOT. But My hair was breaking off right at the roots!! I can't tell you how devastated I was. My ends were fried, and the amount of hair that snapped off (leaving huge areas all over my head only a couple inches long) was unbelievable. I wish I had known that there was a 90 day return policy or else I would have sent it back.....
customer_reviews.author: jessicajean

customer_reviews.title: Not too hot but it is needing 2 hands
customer_reviews.text: I received the black & gold one as a gift. Pros- IT WORKS!!!!! It is quick Cons- Heavy (I have to use 2 hands to use it). Bulky (wide, hard to hold) It DOESN’T get too hot and the bristles are great. I use it on highest setting and the handle is cool as well as knob on top. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Easy to use with great results
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this all in one step dry and style hair dryer. I have very thick coarse hair and medium long hair. It only took me 8 minutes to dry and style my hair. I have to admit I was very surprised. This will be my go to from now on. Not disappointed at all. Just hope with only have 2 settings low or high that it can handle my hair for a long time. Not much hair on brush when finished.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Zier

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! I have always struggled with frizzy hair that has to be straightened or curled after drying and drying with a round brush is a giant pain. This thing makes it easy- dries and straightens at the same time without a learning curve. My hair comes out smooth without the need for a straighten or curling iron. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: BeccaB

customer_reviews.title: Fine thin hair...no problem!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my FINE THIN HAIR! I can dry and straighten at once, saving time and saving my hair from the hot iron. It’s just a little bulky, which is why it’s 4 not 5 stars. I’d really give it a 4.5 because it’s not that big of a deal unless you have limited storage space. My hair looks fuller and I swear have less split ends. It took me a little bit of time to get use to using it but patience has given my fine hair an amazing look!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread my friends!
customer_reviews.text: Yooooo this makes my life SO much easier! I have super curly hair and my arms get so tired if I try to blow dry it straight with a round brush! I can never get the kinks out of the back of my hair either and this gets it. Dries your hair fast too! Wish it had a click button for on and off instead of a twist so I can easily shut it off one handed when I need to set it down. Also it’s pretty loud but still worth it! Get this!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it smoother and adds volume to the hair. You need to be careful to switch between the high setting and cool setting, otherwise the hair gets too hot. The tool is heavy and hard to change settings during styling to avoid burning the hair. Having said all that, I use it everyday and my daughter came home for the holidays and used it in-place of her blow drier and straightener. She is getting one for herself when she gets home.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: This is not for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: I think this would be fabulous for anyone without extremely thick long hair. I towel dried my hair and it wouldn't dry it, I tried washing my hair and letting it air dry for 20 minutes before using it and still it wouldn't dry this hair. In the end I found myself drying my hair with a blow dryer and then when it got close to being dry, started using it and it worked great. But really, I could just use my hairdryer and my flat iron and get the same results faster. So to the charity box it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G Oseland

customer_reviews.title: Great product that dries your hair fast and leaves it looking great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Hot Tools One Step hot brush. It dries your hair, styles it and leaves it smooth and shiny. Best hair drying tool I’ve ever owned. It does get quite hot on high so I use a lower setting. I use a heat protectant before drying and love the results!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Garza

customer_reviews.title: In LOVE!! Brush wet hair sections first with wet brush!
customer_reviews.text: Buy buy buy this baby!!!! Does it dry faster than a blower dryer? No, BUT it is soooooooooooooooo much faster than blow drying and straightening my hair!! This is truly a one step awesome tool!! My super thick bushy scruffy hair actually looks like hair now!! Incredible!! I would definitely recommend putting leave in conditioner on the tips and brushing your wet hair sections with a wet hair friendly brush and then use this tool for the better faster results! Very fun to use and try different curls and looks with this!! Also the noise is no worse than a traditional hair dryer. Buy it. Now!!
customer_reviews.author: Hammy1389

customer_reviews.title: UM YES.
customer_reviews.text: I have chest-length really thin & fine hair. I wanted to try this to help boost volume and to stop doing the old “head upside down & blow dry” trick. This thing is amazing! It doesn’t dry SUPER fast, took me about 20 mins total but the results are amazing. Super soft, shiny, can comb your fingers through it kinda hair. Feels like I just had a salon blowout. I used the low setting as to not damage my hair & I couldn’t be happier. Given I’ve only used it once, I’m hoping it lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amylyru

customer_reviews.title: Quicker dryering tool than a hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Heat level is great, I don't get the bouncy hair style like all the hype in marketing states. However, I will try a blow out lifting product and that may do the trick. Given 4 stars because marketing of volume for this product and reality of me using it per instructions are not in sync.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLoyal

customer_reviews.title: Used and full of black hair
customer_reviews.text: This is a brand new purchase that I received used. I’m a blonde and as soon as I opened the box it was full of someone’s black hair. So gross and nasty. I’m so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: So far, best one
customer_reviews.text: Yep. Tried a lot these past few weeks just to see, sent some back and this is a winner. I also tried some of the knock offs with little luck and then decided to go to the next level just to see. I love it. The choices were very overwhelming and China does a great job of emulating so it was tough. I will repost in a few weeks just to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Best gift to your hair
customer_reviews.text: This is a killer awesome tool for thick, overprocessed hair that is also frizzy without a flatiron. I was concerned about the heat level, but I use it on high and it is easy to maneuver and, although it is hot, it is nowhere near as hot as my hot tools blow dryer on high setting. What used to take me 30-40 minutes to dry, then another 10 to flatiron, is now done in one step in about 20 minutes. The greatest tool for my thick overprocessed hair! I need to pinch myself.
customer_reviews.author: lizduncan

customer_reviews.title: Very hot. Literally
customer_reviews.text: If you use it on "COOL" is better, even takes longer to dry your hair. After drying, my hair is sleek an shiny. First time I've used on LOW and HI it is very hot. I've burned my fingers after touching my hair. Also left my hair very dry towards my ends. I needed to apply a restoration mask or something. I wanna mention that my hair is not treated, and I wash it only with organic products. Therefore if this tool burned my hair is solely for the fact I have use the HI setting.
customer_reviews.author: DIANA

customer_reviews.title: Don't get this one
customer_reviews.text: I used it 3 times and noticed it's way too hot, even on low. So I had to start using it on cool setting, which isn't even cool at all, it's still warm. And it's not running right. It was blowing more at first but I heard a peep now it blows a lot less. Also my hair got caught in the crack of the barrel really bad and it burned my hair even more. Can only turn over next month so I can't return it now. Wish I picked a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!! Saves so mich times and feels amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this every day before work and I absolutely love it! It has made my hair feel so smooth and look shiny. Usually my hair gets extremely oily if I dont wash it every day but after using this I am able to skip a day without feeling all gross from all the oil. I used to blow dry my hair then straighten it but with this I can just dry which saves me a good 15-20 minutes in the morning amd it looks and feels so much better!! Very happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Destini

customer_reviews.title: Very thankful for this tool!
customer_reviews.text: I have unruly wavy frizzy hair that only looks good after drying and flat ironing, until now. I am very thankful I took a chance on this tool. Yesterday I took a shower and didn’t spend the time to do my hair. When my husband got home he commented on how it was time for some professional help at the salon (no time with my 3 young children). This morning I put some oil in my hair and used the hot tool (came late yesterday) with amazement. My husband approves! I can wait to try it after a normal wash routine. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Wifeandmom

customer_reviews.title: Bristles breaking, disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but I've only had it for four months and the bristles are starting to bend and fall out. I'm afraid that this hair dryer isn't going to last much longer. My hair is more on the thin vs. thick side, so I am disappointed to see this happening. Is this normal? I don't see a place to contact the seller. I've found that this hair dryer works best if you dry your hair a little first. It does a great job at getting rid of the kink in the back of my head that is time consuming to dry with round brush. Great product again, would give it five stars if it wasn't falling apart already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Hair dryer straightener!!! Definitely buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! If I could sell them out my front door I would! Totally changed my life. Cut the styling time down to 20 minutes- my thick wavy hair now looks silky smooth. It is not silent so if you have a problem with a loud hair dryer then this is not for you. You should also purchase hair clips to section parts bc the dry hair is smooth and hot! Also buy a really good thermal hair protectant bc this hair dryer straightener is HOT! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Pee Kay

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! My son bought one for his wife and I borrowed it. I had to have my own! This hair dryer makes my hair look like I just came out of a salon. I could never make hair look this full and smooth with a normal dryer. This tool makes my daily life so much easier & faster to get ready. Best investment ever!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: I didn't believe, but WOW
customer_reviews.text: This product is AWESOME. I have thick, wiry hair and this is a GAME CHANGER. Its so much faster in the am, and I no longer have to blow dry and flat iron. It really is so much easier, and my hair looks like I got a professional blow out daily. And trust me, I am not good at doing my hair. I'm basic AF and want to get in and out with good looking hair as fast as possible. This is really a great product, and i use it daily. It even works great for the next day when you don't have time to wash your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Petria

customer_reviews.title: Too much hair, not for me
customer_reviews.text: I guess I really hoped this worked on me but if you have thick hair like me...the only way to get a blow out style without being a pro yourself is going to the salon. The brush is pretty bulky and you can't really get to the base of your scalp to dry. So I ended up with dry hair about 2" off my head and damn frizzy hair near the scalp. Im sure it does wonders for people with half the hair I have so try it yourself before you decide. Cool concept though.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinda

customer_reviews.title: Best. Thing. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I was so tired of fighting with my hair dryer and round brush, trying to get a decent blowout and spending forever on my hair. This little miracle tool gets my naturally curly hair dry in less than half the time and leaves it smooth, bouncy, shiny, with plenty of volume and it stays for days. I wash my hair less, have less damage to my hair and have fewer “mom bun” days. I wish I’d found this thing years ago!
customer_reviews.author: RD Misc

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Just wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love. I have fine hair and unfortunately it is a tad damaged. I was so worried about this tugging and ripping hair and I was pleasantly surprised. After reading that the low setting is best for fine hair that is what I used. It dried my hair so quickly and made it so soft and healthy looking. It didn't pull at all and I was able to style it without a straightener. Im officially obsessed and would recommend this product to anyone. If you are reading this, buy it! It is phenomenal!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Hershey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Just amazing! I had a revlon version of this and I liked it but it didn’t last very long and didn’t completely straighten my hair so I bought this one. This one is way better even though it seems so similar to the revlon dryer. It drys my hair and really straightens out my wavy hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G.

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!!
customer_reviews.text: This blow dryer/brush/hair smoothing straightener is a game changer! I’m totally hair challenged and hate taking the time to section my hair to blow it dry then straighten, maybe add a little curl at the end. This tool is the do all! Doesn’t burn your hair, is fast, lightweight, easy and results are awesome! I’ve been waiting to buy an all in one like this and reviews have all been mixed until Hot Tools. Can’t say enough good!
customer_reviews.author: lilma84

customer_reviews.title: Strong Electrical burning smell after 5th use :(
customer_reviews.text: So i bought this to replace my other Hot Tools brush dryer. Exact same product. My other one was getting old and the engine wasn't running as powerful as when I first got it. I was so excited to get this one. It worked great the first 5 times. Then the 6th time the engine just made a loud noise and the smell of electrical burning was so strong. I got worried and unplugged it immediately. I tried it the next day and the same strong burning smell came out of it. Super dissapointed since my old Hot Tools brush dryer was SOO good. Hopefully this was just one random faulty dryer. :(
customer_reviews.author: Shireen Manteufel

customer_reviews.title: This thing works!
customer_reviews.text: This makes a blow out much easier for many reasons. The first bring that I only need this one tool, not a blow dryer, a concentrator, a hair brush, etc. I can just bring this one item on the go. I read some reviews that says it gets too hot, it doesn’t get any hotter than a blow dryer or straight iron and it wouldn’t work if it didn’t have some heat. I am very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Your hair will thank you
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver/timesaver/hairsaver THIS IS EVERYTHING I am the type of person who would use a hair straightener because i never learned how to blow dry my hair holding a blow drier and a brush in two separate hands (it’s hard okay!!) Ever since i bought this, my hair straightener has been sitting in my drawer collecting dust. It used to take me 45 minutes to get my hair done, now 20min tops. Yes it gets hot but isn’t that the point? Love this, definitely best purchase of the DECADE
customer_reviews.author: Diana H.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great for my baby hairs that I can never get right with a regular blow dryer. It is very easy to use and cuts my drying time way down. I can make my hair with as much volume as I want and well as a little wave at the bottom. I have little to no fly always and the frizz is down to a minimum with this very happy! The sound is a little quieter than their blow-dryer that looks exactly like this.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Really good, but still want better
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my daughter and myself. It works perfectly for her, thick, somewhat straight hair. But for me, wavy/curly thick hair, not that good. So, it’s been awesome for her, 1/2 hour and she’s done, hair looks fabulous. But after 1 hour, initially my hair looked good, but once I went out it got all poofy. Long story short, works for non wavy/curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Natfames

customer_reviews.title: 💯💯💯
customer_reviews.text: Ok I’m not even kidding this is the best hair tool I have ever bought. Absolutely worth $80. I’m never using a straightener again. I’m so glad I don’t have to use as many heat tools on my hair now. Usually, my hair is frizzy and wavy after I dry it so I straighten it. But after this, it’s so smooth and silky and straight!!! If you have doubts, BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Miller

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I was very wary of this product and products similar to it cause I've had very little success with them in the past, but this is a game changer. I used to shower in the evening then style in the morning, cause I never felt I had the time to shower and style my hair in the mornings, but with this tool I can go from wet/damp hair to dry and styled in 15 min! Its super easy to use, and while it may look a bit unwieldy at first, it take 5 min to get he hang of it. love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this. I have ALOT of very thick coarse hair This takes 20 minutes to dry my hair, which helps me not put it in a heavy bun.... super pleased. Am thinking about getting one of those heat gloves though because it gets very very hot
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Great for frizzy/wavy hair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this all in one styler! It has been a game changer for my frizzy/wavy hair. Using a regular blow dryer always left my hair dry and frizzy so I would have to straighten it after. But with this wonderful tool I can blow dry and tame my hair in 10 minutes—less time than it used to take me to blow dry my hair! There is a little bit of a learning curve for the hair at the top of your head/fringe around your face but even if it isn’t perfect it’s easy to fix with a straightener if you feel like you have to!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Harris

customer_reviews.title: Mommy must-have
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, dried and styled my hair in less than 10 minutes. Definitely a mommy must have. I feel like I’ve gotten a blow out everytime i use it and i don’t know why, but my hair lasts longer between washes without getting really greasy. Love the texture and volume it gives my hair, that a straightener does not. This is an all In one product!
customer_reviews.author: Camille Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. It dries my hair very quickly leaving it smooth with the perfect amount of volume. I have naturally wavy hair with a lot of frizz. This tames my frizziness and does a good job at straightening the hair (8/10 compared to hair straightener). Compared to other users I did not find this brush to be too big nor too heavy. Very easy to manipulate. I would definitely recommend this product. Upsides: Time saver, straightens hair, little to no flyaways, smooth hair finish, perfect volume. Downsides: Cool and Low settings same temp, High setting too hot, may damage hair if used improperly. Overall: 8.5/10
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect smithing tool
customer_reviews.text: My hair stylist recommended this styling brush and I was skeptical, until I had it in my hands. It’s a game changer. I dry my thick, unruly hair about 75% dry and then switch to this brush. I end up with smooth and shiny hair. No flat iron needed. Plus this smooths your hair without the super flat look you can get from a flat iron. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dlog

customer_reviews.title: This will change your life!
customer_reviews.text: I already own the Revlon version but when it stopped working (less than a year), I needed a replacement. This really lived up to the reviews. It’s similar to the Revlon, but it has better gripping power for those of us with fine hair. And styling only takes less than 10 minutes. Make sure that you use a good heat protectant to avoid heat damage.
customer_reviews.author: NurseLanae

customer_reviews.title: EASIER ON HAIR
customer_reviews.text: Need to let hair dry a bit before using this tool. Found it a little difficult to handle on back side of my head. Do like the fact that it doesn't make hair frizzy like most hair dryers. My hair is short (2-4 inches long). Longer hair would definitely be a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Rule

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer for Hard to Manage Hair
customer_reviews.text: OH WOW!! I don’t ever blow dry my hair because it becomes a huge fluffy mess. Cut to present day and this Hot Tools dryer!! I dry it every day, obsessively. My hair looks like a salon blow out, and I am no hair stylist, trust me! It’s a little heavy and awkward to hold at first, but I think once you get the hang of it it’ll change your life.
customer_reviews.author: petey

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Volume!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on days I don’t wash my hair. My hair type is thin and gets oily easily so I try not to over wash it. Every other day I rinse it, use a sea salt texture spray, and blow dry it. I’m not very good at styling and blow drying so I bought this to try and OMG it made my hair as voluminous as when I wash it. And it was so easy to use. As easy as brushing your hair. I’m in awe. I use the low heat control and its great for my thin hair.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne B.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Oh my momma. I have naturally curly hair, THIS is a game changer. It’s faster, and provides a better quality blow-out than traditional blow dryers. Also, the face frame area is usually the hardest to do. This design allows the face frame to be free of curly bumps with high volume. The best blow dryer I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Wroubel

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this dryer!! What used to take me an hour know takes me 15-20 mins. I’m not even joking. Added to the fact that it leaves my hair looking as shinny and sleek just like after using a flat iron. It does gives volume too if you want. I will say tho this is if you’re more into looks and having more “professional” tools. I have the Revlon one as well and it works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Good idea poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Quit heating after two weeks replacement works so far but won’t hold breath, sent it back but amazon hasn’t received yet and is threatening to double charge me
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING! As a licensed cosmologist when it comes to doing my own hair I want it to be easy and fast and this does the trick! Would be great for beginners or those who might not be able to use the round brushing and blowdrying technique.. Especially when you get that same voluminous outcome! Plus the shine is gives to my hair without any product is absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Just Craftin

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of flat ironing my hair, which gave me zero volume and no interest. Styling my own hair is something I've always found difficult, but this brush worked beautifully for awesome results! The next day, I got many compliments on my hair. If you're a blowout novice like me, watch a few YouTube tutorials for tips. I use inexpensive velcro rollers to set the curls on the crown for really pretty shape. My hair holds a lot of moisture, so I don't find that the highest heat setting is too much. I have mixed wavy/straight, thick Asian hair that never holds curls long, but this lasts at least 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works Great But Dries Hair Slowly
customer_reviews.text: Works great at making hair smooth and sleek however it took forever to dry my hair with just this. I end up using this brush turned on low and my hair dryer at the same time so it dries quicker with both anyway. Results were great though. I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: CCaf

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I've only had it for two days but it has made a huge difference in how my hair looks - without much of a learning curve to use it. In fact, I was asked by several people if I had just been to the salon! If you are on the fence, do not hesitate. For what it's worth, I have medium-fine hair that has a slight kink to it. When I use a flatiron on it, it looks flat and dead - but this thing leaves me with full, shiny hair. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Midorigreen

customer_reviews.title: Like the product. Hope the replacement will last.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this dryer so much, until the motor gave out in just 3 months! I used it on the low setting every time I used it. Very disappointed. It's not cheap at $90 bucks. I expected it to last a long a while longer. ***Update*** I contacted Hot Tools customer service, and the dryer has a lifetime warranty, so they are shipping me a new one at no charge! I'm very thankful, as I loved it! They are a great company to work with! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Dykgraaf

customer_reviews.title: One and done
customer_reviews.text: I don’t attempt to straighten my wavy hair often, so I debated quite a while before purchasing this. This makes straightening my long, thick, wavy hair the easiest and quickest it’s ever been. I can’t even get decent results with my high powered dryer and brushes and still have to flat iron it. This tool does the job so it is much less damaging on those days I do want to go straight. It’s easy to use and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Lahtidah

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This dryer saves so much time. When I blow dry my hair with a regular dryer I always have to use a straightener to get rid of the frizziest and flyaways. Drying time is considerably less than a regular dryer, too.
customer_reviews.author: B. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I have thick, wavy hair and when I use this dryer/styler I am able to have sleek, smooth hair without the use of a flat iron. It also dries your hair very quickly which is just so wonderful. I rarely give any product 5 stars but this one is definitely deserving.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Tea

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE..especially for busy Mom's!
customer_reviews.text: This styling tool has replaced my blow dryer and straightener!! Get a salon blow out at home in the fraction of the time!! I've never been able to blow my hair out like my hair dresser UNTIL I purchased this amazing tool! I absolutely love this and would recommend to anyone! I have medium-long length hair and I was able to fully dry my hair in under 30 minutes and it looked professionally done! No joke!
customer_reviews.author: THERESA

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT NOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buy it right now, you won't regret it! It has cut my drying time in half and makes my hair smoother, softer, and adds volume. I can't tell you how many people have asked what I am doing differently with my hair. Love this product. I can't say enough good things about it!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Jarnecke

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace not one, but two other brush blow dryers that each caught on fire after about six months. This one, so far, is a,axing and works like a charm in my very fine, wavy (prone to frizz) shoulder length hair. It works wonders against Florida humidity.
customer_reviews.author: QueenLori

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This might be one of the best things I’ve purchased on amazon to date. I have very curly hair naturally, and a lot of it. It was so easy to use, my hair looks like I just walked out of my salon. Pretty lightweight, a little big so I’ll be interested to see if I bring it along when I travel. But I’m so satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I have made!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I am actually shocked at how good this works! I can’t stop touching my hair!! It is a bit heavy, but not too bad. I have bad wrists and this was easier then traditionally blowing out my hair. I work in the beauty industry so I always use professional machines. I would def use a heat protectant on your hair, because it does get pretty hot. Buy it! You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M. Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I have frizzy Curley hair that requires a lot of time and effort to dry, curler or straighten. This product will cut down my time significantly and does a great job. I was hesitant that it would work and was pleasantly surprised. I did a great job. I’m so excited to find something to help manage my wild hair.😉
customer_reviews.author: GMB12

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing blow out! Seriously, even better than the blow out I get at the salon. Especially when I add volume hair mouse to my roots the volume is gorgous. I have some what thin hair and with this blow dryer I get amazing volume and shiny silky hair at the same time. This is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Yasemin

customer_reviews.title: Very effective drying and styling tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool has reduced my hair drying and styling time significantly. I have long, thick, wavy, fine hair. I can get it dried and styled within 15-20 minutes vs 45 in the past. Onlycomplaint so far is I've only had it about a month and a half and the lettering for the settings is already wearing off and the cool shot button isn't cool. Not a deal breaker for me but just something to keep aware.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Works Beautifully- large barrel
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had gotten this a long time ago! It is easy to use and leaves hair smooth and adds great volume to roots. The barrel was larger than I expected so if you have really short hair, I doubt it would work very well. My hair is right at my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 Revlon one step driers like this but after about a year all the bristles melted and broke off the brush. After that, it just didn't work right. Plus ugggh melted plastic. This cost about $15 more than the reason Revlon and the bristles seem higher quality. It's only been a month or so but it makes my hair look great. It's very quick too. If tne Revlon took 20 minutes this takes 12 with a very good result. Only time will tell if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I have thin fine hair and I love how this too is so easy and fast to use. My hair never gets tangled and the holding positions are surprisingly comfortable. The end result is a smooth, full look. Even better, i cut my drying time in half. This tool is a great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Beairsto

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I have a lot of fine hair and this dries and smoothes wonderfully well, NO frizz. The comparable Revlon drier leaves tons of frizz in my hair and I always have to follow up with product or a flat iron, not with this one, one tool is all you need.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Best hair tool !
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I used to hate blow drying my hair, this product is amazing. It straightens and adds volume without needing a straightener after the blow dry. Took me a little to figure out when to use, I used it on my hair dry and it didn’t turn out great but then I used it on wet hair and damp hair and results were stunning !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: efficient with a fabulous finish💖
customer_reviews.text: Pros:👍🏻💁‍♀️ - I was able to cut my drying time in half. -My hair feels soft and silky. -It provided a finished effortless look. -I could use this product everyday considering the efficiency, a great deal of my time is was not lost. Something to consider:🤔 -If I wanted more of a “date night” “or ladies night out” type of look, I would follow up with a hot iron curling/styling tool. -Buy it!💘 I stay at home with my little one. I’m more into looking put together in an effortless, casual way. I appreciate the fact I can do my hair in a short amount of time. It’s perfect for a finished airy look💝
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. The motor started to die in a month
customer_reviews.text: I had the Revlon model for over a year and loved it. I bought this Hot Tools version (for $30 more!) after a you tube review that showed it controlled frizz better than the Revlon version. I used this less than 10 times and the motor already started to die mid use!! So I returned it and went back to the Revlon model.
customer_reviews.author: LoriG

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS THING!
customer_reviews.text: Best hair care product I've ever had! Easy to use and styles my hair just the way I want it.
customer_reviews.author: cmk

customer_reviews.title: Great styler!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this! I just wish it didn’t pull so many hairs out! I do really love the results though! I always put heat protectant spray and I always brush prior with a separate hair brush before using it and I always style on low heat but I still seem to be pulling out a lot of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney williams

customer_reviews.title: Daily use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool! I use it daily for a quick fast style. I've used the cheaper version of this air brush dryer and can definitely say I will never go back. I notice the difference in smoothness in my hair. I found myself replacing those other dryers anywhere between 3-4 months. As of now 4 months and counting. If anything changes with this product ill update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Super purchase for long, fine, and thick hair!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little bigger/sturdier than I was anticipating... it sure beats holding a round brush and a dryer! My hair is fine but I have a ton of hair and it’s super thick volume-wise. My hair also holds a lot of moisture and usually takes around 20 minutes to dry. This cut my dry time in half! Super happy I went with this brand and product versus others that were less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Mailliard

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: For the first 5 weeks, this was the most amazing hair tool! I was recommending it to everyone! The volume I could get with this Hot Tools blow dryer brush was out of this world and it is so easy to use! It died two days ago. I’m that’s right, it is now dead after 5 weeks! The amazon return policy is 30 days, so now I have a $70 dead blow dryer brush that I can’t return! So frustrating! I don’t want to spend another $70 on something that will only last another 5 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Hair Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Really great! Better than Revlon One Step. Worth the increased price over Revlon. Perfect for medium length to long hair. I use high heat in beginning then switch to low heat. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you want to buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I got my hair cut to above my shoulders. I knew I would be able to style it like my stylest did. This brush/blow-dryer has changed everything. My hair is smooth, looks blown out, and I don't have to wash my hair often. Yes try it, so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh!! This is an amazing hair dryer! I have thick/coarse shoulder length hair and it normally takes 25 minutes to blow dry! With this product, it only takes me 15 minutes at the most! It gives my hair great volume also! I absolutely LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Corley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: At first, this brush didn't really work for me. Shorty after buying, I got the keratin treatment. Now I love this brush. The traditional way of straightening with round brush and blow dryer is still a pain when you have the keratin treatment but this brush works much faster and with much less effort.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! I could never blow dry my hair with a brush on one hand and the dryer on the other. My hair used to end up looking super puffy and crazy. This changes everything! It is so easy to use and the results are amazing! Just make sure you are not using it on super wet hair, let your hair air dry a little bit and then go in with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: Changed my life! I have thick naturally curly hair. I dried my hair to about 80% then used this product in sections. It took about 15mins Max for the whole process. My hair was straight and smooth. Very easy to use. No flat iron needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: Great styler. Annoying sound.
customer_reviews.text: I have long, thick hair and it holds water like a sponge. This tool has been great. Easy to use and lightweight. Because of the thickness of my hair, I dry the roots with a regular dryer first, then section and blow out the rest with the styler. It works great. My only CON is the sound. The motor is loud, sharp pitched and the noise is aggravating. Maybe if I’d opted for a tool at a higher price point, the motor would be less annoying? That said, I still use it regularly and get a great style.
customer_reviews.author: LCD17050

customer_reviews.title: OMG...The HOT TOOLS One-Step BLOWOUT is a GAME CHANGER/MUST HAVE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I have been recommended so many products & tools for my fine, thin hair and NOTHING ever works or has been a game changer since I discovered this product. I used it last night for the first time and my hair looks professionally blown out, it was so nice & straight I didn't even need my flatiron. Ladies, you NEED this product, trust me! It's easy to use (I figured it out myself by just reading the instructions, but I'm sure there are great YouTube videos out there too).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product does help to reduce styling time. It's a little large but I find it to be easier than brush and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Sf

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this, does what it says, I have had it for about three months and it still works like the day I got it. After reading reviews of this one and others, I was concerned that it would burn out, but so far so good. Will update if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely changed how I do my hair!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BRUSH! I’ve used similar items in the past since I’m no good doing blow outs the old fashioned way (brush in one hand, dryer in the other). And they’ve always taken AT LEAST an hour to get through my full head and for my hair to be ‘pretty dry.’ But this baby can cut my hair drying time down to at most 30 minutes (after going through to adjust how my hair falls, fastest time 20 minutes), and all my hair is completely dry! I have thick wavey/Curley hair and his leaves my hair silky smooth and a relaxed straight. Do pair with a heat protectant because this brush can get very hot so beware!
customer_reviews.author: Megan McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool! I have course, thick, frizzy hair. Normally my hair takes 20-25 minutes to blow dry/round brush. First use this dried my hair in 13 minutes (on the LOW setting!) and I just needed to touch up with my flat iron. I’m sure my time will shorten as I get more comfortable with the tool. Overall it the best thing since sliced bread. Update: Used on high today (1/1/2020) and it cut my dry time to 10 minutes. I no longer dread washing my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for my hair!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so great! Waited a few months to see if it really worked. I have curly hair that I have gotten expensive treatments to tame. This dryer takes care of everything. No frizz. Fast drying. Simply love it. It’s pricey but worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool! Best one step blow dryer out there!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is amazing!! I tried the Revlon one first and returned it because it was so awful. It made my hair look fried, frizzy and poofy! This one left my hair silky, shiny and no frizz! I am amazed at how different the two are. If you have thick hair that is wavy and gets frizzy this black gold one will work alot better for you then the Revlon and it doesn't fry your hair like that one. I would use the low setting because it gets hot enough and is less damaging. I highly recommend! Also this one feels more luxurious and better quality then the Revlon one. The Revlon one feels really cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa C

customer_reviews.title: Best tool ever!
customer_reviews.text: The best tool I have ever invested in, and ai have invested in A LOT!!! I have curly thick Indian hair and I got tired of blow drying and then using a flat iron to straighten my hair. I succumbed to just trying my hair up and giving up on the styling before work. I saw this and was like maybe I should give it a try, what have I got to lose. First time trying it.....from damp hair to dry straight hair 10mins!!!! Literally life saver before work. I feel like I leave for work so much more put together bc I cna do my hair nicely! Definitely would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Minoo Makkencherry

product_meta.title: HOT TOOLS Professional Black Gold One Step Dryer & Volumizer
product_meta.description:
Color:Black GoldIntroducing the superb tool that brings out the stylist in everyone. A tool with unmatched technology and a unique design to deliver perfect results in little time. The secret to mastering the best at-home professional salon blowout starts with the design. The unique shape creates lift at the root, and crafts curled ends and consistently gorgeous results with every use. Unique airflow vents aid faster styling by providing efficient drying contact. Part of the Black Gold line, this unique tool features a styling surface that was designed by experts to be the ultimate in styling tools for even the most tireless stylists to enjoy. Paired with an exceptional styling surface, the One-Step Blowout styling tool features Boar Tech 2 Bristles with Silk Glide and Natura Max Activated Charcoal. Consistent, even heat helps reduce over-styling damage and help keep hair looking healthy with a smooth, shiny finish. A rotating temperature control with three speed settings provides styling versatility and great performance on all hair types. The lightweight design and soft-touch finish provide a comfortable grip and the 8ft. professional swivel cord gives you free range of movement, all creating an enjoyable styling experience. The ALCI safety plug, which is required for all U.S. hair dryers, provides added safety. A limited lifetime warranty guarantees you a lifetime of mastering the best at-home professional blowout!

BRAND STORY
Hot Tools Professional is a dependable brand that’s been winning awards for over 25 years, creating superior, innovative tools.
feature_bullets: Channel your inner stylist and master the best at-home professional blowout with the Hot Tools Professional Black Gold Charcoal Infused One-Step Blowout.
Features a Black Gold styling surface designed by experts to be the ultimate in styling tools for even the most tireless stylists to enjoy.
Lightweight design and Soft-Touch finish provide comfortable styling experience.
Designed with an ALCI safety plug (required for U.S. hair dryers).
8ft. professional swivel cord for free range of movement to give you consistent results all over.
